thread.title: Azerbaijani President awards group of servicemen of Internal Troops with “Medal for Military Services”
thread.title_full: Azerbaijani President awards group of servicemen of Internal Troops with “Medal for Military Services”

author: APA
title: Azerbaijani President awards group of servicemen of Internal Troops with “Medal for Military Services”
text: The military servicemen of the Internal Troops of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Republic of Azerbaijan have been awarded the “Medal for Military Services”, [APA](https://apa.az) reports. President Ilham Aliyev has signed an Order in this regard. The military servicemen of the Internal Troops of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Republic of Azerbaijan have been awarded the “Medal for Military Services”, [APA](https://apa.az) reports. President Ilham Aliyev has signed an Order in this regard.
